\doxysubsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Contains methods used to transform Objects into program strings, which in turn can be appended to \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1base_1_1InputProgram}{it.\+unical.\+mat.\+embasp.\+base.\+Input\+Program}}
